title.rendered: Top 5 best online internship portals in 2021

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

An internship can be best defined as an on – job training work experience provided by an organization where an individual gets the best exposure to the work life environment.

Unlike traditional times where internships were not given as much attention, in the present day world, internships play a prominent role in providing the right kind of work exposure which inturn helps in qualifying the job level requirements in future.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]We don’t need more reasons, but here is why every college going student and a fresher should hunt for internship opportunities before they can land on a full time job placement – [/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

  • To get exposure of the professional work life environment (learn a few office jargons, it might help to leave good impressions)
  • To get a platform to showcase and build your skills while pursuing your academic degree
  • To explore your interests and capabilities
  • To learn from your experienced colleagues
  • Most importantly, to build an impressionable CV

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]Now the question that must come to mind is, how to get into one of these internships?? Well let me come to the point of writing this blog..

We are sharing our top 5 picks for online job portals where you can apply for your desired and best-fit internship – [/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”mulled_wine” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

  1. Internshala – 

[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image=”16780″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]The first and the foremost internship provider we would like to recommend is Internshala. It is the very first thing that comes in mind when you use the word internship providers for all the right reasons. 

  • Pre prepared online resume according to your profile
  • Filter box – helps you filter the right internship for you
  • Assured internship providing companies registered

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”mulled_wine” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

  1. LinkedIn – 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”16781″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]As we know, LinkedIn is a social platform for all the working professionals where you can interact and share your profile directly with the employers.Fact that a lot of us are unaware about is that LinkedIn acts as an excellent resource to look for internships if used correctly.

  • Thousands of positions and companies to choose from
  • Filter provided to make your research easy
  • Directly connect with the employers

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”mulled_wine” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

  1. LetsINTERN – 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”16784″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]Another amazing website offering a wide range of internships is LetsINTERN. It lets you filter out the best internship according to various preset characteristics.

  • Varied options available
  • Exposure to the best internships available in large organizations
  • Tips on their blogs to make students aware about making the right choices

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_separator color=”mulled_wine” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

  1. HelloIntern – 

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”16786″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

HelloIntern is considered as a global internship provider and expert. It offers flexibility in terms of applying for an internship in biggest companies as well as startups and non – profit organizations.

 • Varied companies to choose from
• Provides internships openings in large organizations for the best exposure
• Offers to attend various training programs to learn new skills

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”mulled_wine” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]5. OysterConnect.com –

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”16788″ img_size=”medium” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” css_animation=”fadeIn”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]The only reason for us to mention this portal in our list is its unique ideology which is formed in contrast to traditional form of internships. OysterConnect.com is a virtual student workforce platform which allows students to work on various projects together. Wherein, one part is done by a student, second part is done by another student and the same process is followed till the task is finally completed.

 • More than 60,000 + students
• 100 + colleges and 50 + cities
• Different projects to work on
• Helps you explore your talent

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”mulled_wine” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

Get going. Remember that trying and then failing is better than not trying at all. Keep applying, keep giving interviews – the process itself will act as the biggest teacher and you will realise you have developed skills of modifying resume as per job requirements, finding the best-fit in an ocean of opportunities, growing with the experience of giving interviews, documenting the feedbacks and holaaa you are already winning the race than the one’s not going through the process at all.

Now that you have got an idea of what an internship is and how to find one for yourself, use your time wisely and get on to finding your best pick.

But before that, here is a quick fact to end our blog on a good note.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeIn”]

A QUICK FACT WITH SDBI –

Around 7 million blog posts get published per day.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_text_separator title=”SDBI” color=”juicy_pink” style=”shadow” css_animation=”fadeIn”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
